talk_1002:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>Hey! Don't get near me dressed like that!
What if they get suspicious of me too?

<sp:0:2:2:7d00>Go away! And be quick about it!<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Com_Talk_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:TalkPositive>Grilled, delicious, wonderful bananas!
Step right up, and buy a bunch!
Com_Talk_07: <sp:3:0:2:0700>No bananas left, all thanks to you!
Com_Talk_08:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>You haven't got enough rupees, friend.
I'm afraid you can't pay for these bananas
in installments.
talk_1040:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>There's only one place for those who deny
the joys of a grilled banana...
Com_Talk_09:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Well, it looks like your pouch is full.
Not even room for a banana in there.
I can tell from here.
Com_Talk_11_d: <sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughL>I bet you want more, don't you?
Com_Talk_12: <sp:3:0:2:0700>These bananas are my pride and joy!
talk_1010:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>What sort of icy heart does it take to turn
down a hot, freshly grilled banana?

Are you gonna be a lookie-loo, or will you
buy a banana or two? Just one bite and it
all begins!
talk_1030:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>All right, then. Hope you come back soon!
That's a lie fresh off the grill of deception.
Com_Talk_36: <sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughL>You really are a banana fan, aren't you?
Com_Talk_37:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:TalkPositive>Well, well...<sp:5:1:0> Thanks to you, I'm all out of
bananas to grill!

Still want to take a look at the menu
before you go?
talk_1000:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Step right up—come and chill!
Hot bananas, fresh off the grill!

Hold 'em in your hands, feel that heat!
Take a big bite, what a treat!

And the flavor—like a dream! A little taste
of heaven, if you know what I mean.

Stop right there and buy a pair!
Com_Talk_20: <sp:3:0:2:0700>These bananas are my pride and joy!
talk_1001:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Step right up—come and chill!
Hot bananas, fresh off the grill!

Hold 'em in your hands, feel that heat!
Take a big bite, what a treat!

And the flavor—like a dream! Grilled
banana heaven, if you know what I mean.

Stop right there and buy a pair!
